title: The main idea of the message

content.description:
You will listen to a selection in Japanese. After listening to the selection, choose the response that is best according to the selection.

Voice message (Selection plays two times.)
content.question: What is this telephone message about?

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
